title: MD
biography: Oncology, from Ancient Greek ὄγκος (ónkos), meaning "tumor, bulk", and λόγος (lógos), meaning "study", is a branch of medicine that deals with the study, treatment, diagnosis, and prevention of cancer. A medical professional who practices oncology is an oncologist.
aiSummary: Rakesh K. Srivastava Oncology is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 3 at Translational cancer research (Member). Has been published in Experimental cell research, Lasers in medical science, BMJ case reports. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
